review: We own both a Roku and 2 Amazon Fire TV Sticks and have for at least 6 months. Unfortunately, both fire tv sticks freeze constantly. The picture will freeze while the volume continues and then the screen catches up and speeds through the scene. Its a terrible way to watch a show when it does this constantly. Have tried unplugging to restart it and it only works temporarily. Great products other than that but I have to say, the Roku wins if given the comparison because of this issue.

review: Uh...I'm in the USA, my registered address is there, all my dealings with Amazon have been in ENGLISH - but this came set up in German.  I don't read German so it took a while before I finally got everything changed to English.So far so good, though.  A bit of a learning curve in spite of what they say.  It only allows you 250 songs from iTunes without paying extra so that's kind of useless.  I don't think my 20+GB of photos will be allowed, either, unless I pay more.
